allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete UI redesign with modern dark theme

- Add Tailwind CSS v4 with custom design system \(CSS variables for colors, typography, spacing\)
- Create reusable UI components: Card, Button, Badge, Select, Progress, Skeleton, Tooltip, EmptyState
- Add sidebar navigation layout with Header component
- Redesign FileUploader with drag-and-drop preview and progress indicator
- Redesign OverviewDashboard with sortable data table using @tanstack/react-table
- Redesign InsightsPanel with syntax-highlighted code blocks \(prism-react-renderer\)
- Add framer-motion animations and react-hot-toast notifications
- Fix Select dropdown z-index issue for proper layering
- Configure ports: frontend on 3008, backend on 8001

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add landing page and Railway deployment config

- Create beautiful landing page with hero, features, and how-it-works sections
- Add smooth transitions from landing page to app
- Configure Railway deployment \(Procfile, nixpacks.toml, railway.json\)
- Use environment variables for API URL \(VITE_API_URL\)
- Add .env.example for frontend configuration

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
